reviews.review: Играю с выхода,Решил всё что можно,поиграл почти все модификации,с другом играть самое то,а вот с рандомами лучше не надо
Kinda god tier game. Literally the best game ever created. Worth every cent and second spent on it.
i recommend it, its portal 2, what else is there to be said?

Un juego sinceramente extraordinario. Su ambiente y sus personajes son geniales, al igual que su dificultad. GLaDOS se convirtió en mi personaje favorito. Hubo un punto en el que solo quería avanzar en los niveles para saber que es lo que ella diría acerca de mi progreso. La historia está bien dirigida y el lore es interesantísimo. Lo recomiendo totalmente 10/10 GLaDOS best girl.
Absolute favourite game & best game ever made in my opinion!! Excellent story and level design for solo play, awesome coop... couldn't be more perfect
been my favorite game for a long time. 100% would recommend to absolutely anyone
One of the best games ever made. It is in the top three of my favorite games. Everything about this game was perfect, graphics, music, dialog, plot, etc.
Difficult at times, but enjoyable after working through the co-op,
剧情很棒，双人游戏也很欢乐，地图工坊的图也很有意思。
It is good. yes. buy the game you must. bring order to galaxy you must. hmmm
智慧的结晶，年度游戏的优秀续作。

Génial, ludique, décalé. bref Portal 1/2 qui doivent faire parti de la bibliothèque de tout les anciens joueurs Steam, sont juste excellent (mr Smiters). 

Ce qui est bon c'est de voir comment Steam / Valve a rallumé le feu sous la marmite vidéo-ludique de ce qui l'as fait devenir ce qu'il est aujourd'hui (+1pt en valeur cognitive).
J'en ai déjà l'eau à la bouche, terrifié et impatient de voir ce que le devenir de tout ça va être.
Muy buena física, hoy todavía no entiendo como hacen lo de los portales
Pika! mais pra ser legal tem ter um esperto e um burrro ou dois animais
the story was really good and the multiplayer is a nice touch. 10/10 would recommend
A true classic. Every steam library should have it.
Damn, it may an old one but just get and play this game.

L'un des meilleurs FPS type casse tête si ce n'est le meilleur.
Si vous êtes physicien vous allez appréciez le jeu encore plus...
Genius conception, genius dialogues, and the fact that there is a coop mod and that you can build and share your own test rooms, making infinite possibilities and game time. Rly Great
Amazing physics, amazing story, amazing puzzles.
Juego que pondra a prueba tu inteligencia v: (tal vez)
great game and the new rooms constantly being made by players means you never run out of replay options
Divertido y muy interesante. El reto es bastante alto y la historia muy divertida.

Nice puzzler. Satisfying when it clicks into place.
At times a bit too easy - there's only one thing to do therefore that must be it.

wheres the third one,
cmon valve
Хорошие головоломки. Посидели, побалдели и вышли. Хватит на неделю. Стоит своих денег.

C'est un très bon jeu. Les graphisme ne vieillisse pas, les mécaniques sont bonnes et les énigmes restent amusantes, sans pour autant être trop dur ou impossible, peu importe le nombre de fois auquel on joue à ce jeu. Le seul bémol serait sa durée de vie, mais si on prend le temps de rechercher tout les détails et secrets du jeu, on en a pour une bonne vingtaine d'heure !

é um jogo com uma narrativa bastante fixe, onde ela mesma é um puzzle, existe plot twists que não estamos há espera, e a jogabilidade em si é muito boa pois faz com que puxemos pela cabeça para fazer os puzles, o jogo em si não tem violencia, a não ser termos de matar um robo ou outro, ou o humor negro do jogo. Mas é um jogo bastante bom e recomendo-o sim :)

Mogę powiedzieć że ta gra jest jedną z najlepszych w jakie grałem. Fabuła jak i Soundtracki są wyśmienite. Przechodziłem tą grę parę razy a i tak mogę grać w nią od nowa. Fajnymi opcjami są również Community mapy oraz tryb multiplayer. Szczerze mogę wam bardzo polecić tą grę bo się w niej zakochałem.

Great puzzle game. Love the feeling of escaping from an abandoned factory. Even though the facility is really old and torn apart, some technology is still functional, and the game balances between navigating through waiting lobbies that stayed the same throughout the years and abandoned, broken caverns with worn bridges and stairs.
Overall, great atmosphere and lore, with challenging puzzles.

This game have a great storyline and co op is superduper fun .
P.S. Can someone be my play friend.
P.P.s I speak finland and little bit english.
P.P.P.s I'am so alone
P.P.P.P.S gotcha!

эта одна из самых забавных и интересных головоломок в моей жизни. управление, уровни, ГЛАДОС💞💞💞💞💞 моя любовь
я не представляю, сколько всего я ещё не знаю об этой игре, но я не устаю проходить её снова и снова, рофлить с сарказма ГЛАДОС и с турелей моих турелей.
портал 2 это достояние ЮНЕСКО девочки

блин, просто супер игра, своих денег СТОИТ 
ахеренная игра
Um dos melhores jogos de puzzle ja criados
沒什麼好說的 佳作

Portal 2 = more physics + more puzzle + FPS = a must play game if you like the formula/Portal 1

Very fun unique game. I played it when it came out years ago and wanted try it again. Just as fun the second time.  

There is some screen shaking, so if that bugs (like me) there may be a few scenes you're trying to speed through.
6块钱能让自己头晕，他不香吗
A truely awesome game with an awesome ending!
